```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
library(janitor)
library(lubridate)
```

```{r}

NMFS_transect <- read_csv(here("data", "table_257.csv")) %>% 
  clean_names()

NMFS_obs <- read_csv(here("data", "table_258.csv")) %>% 
  clean_names()
  
```

```{r}
nmfs_data <- NMFS_obs %>%
  inner_join(NMFS_transect, by = "gis_key")

```

```{r}
write.csv(nmfs_data, "C:\\Users\\julia\\Documents\\_MEDS\\EDS222_Stats_Carleton\\Assignments\\final_project\\eds222_final", row.names = FALSE)

```

```{r}
cruise_info <- unique(nmfs_data$cruise)
cruise_info

species_info <- unique(nmfs_data$species)
species_info
```

```{r}
dates_info <- unique(nmfs_data$date)
dates_info
```

```{r}
nmfs_data <- nmfs_data %>% 
  separate(date, sep="-", into = c("year", "month", "day"))
  
```

```{r}
nmfs_data <- nmfs_data %>% 
  mutate(common_name = "") %>% 
  filter(species == c("BFAL", "LAAL")) %>% 
  relocate(common_name, .after = species)
```

```{r}
species_info <- unique(nmfs_data$species)
species_info
```
```{r}
nmfs_data <- nmfs_data %>% 
  mutate(common_name = case_when(
    species == "BFAL" ~ "Blackfooted albatross",
    species == "LAAL" ~ "Laysan albatross"
  )
  )
```

```{r}
common_info <- unique(nmfs_data$common_name)
common_info
```
